overview:
Ryan is a PR and communications professional working in the tech industry, and Director at MaintainPR, where he helps early and late-stage startups in both European and US markets with media placements and social media awareness.

Having worked as a products intern at Wired magazine, and subsequently in specialized fields of the communications industry, Ryan has developed expertise in both hardware and software-related tech, music, media and more. He worked with the social content site Digg, as well as the Internet television network, Revision3.

In 2010, Ryan relocated to London in order to work with the social dashboard Hellotxt, and through various event and marketing initiatives quickly became a major proponent of London’s Silicon Roundabout.

Currently working with several innovative European and American startups, and with an emphasis on mobile and social business, Ryan continues to watch social media evolve, and gets more and more excited about its future.
